review.title: “Dynamic work environment with experienced professionals”
review.pros: Pros – Full disclosure: I was an intern.Easy access to senior management...I had direct contact to MDs and SVPsCompetitive pay.Exciting work environment...the company is growing fast
review.cons: Cons – Very unstructured...there was no training program or introduction. Very sink or swim. The dynamic nature of the company can sometimes border on hectic.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Childish, very similar to working at Putnam Investments”
